name: anayou
overview:
The internet is a driving force to change the lives of people for the better.

anayou believes that the people of Arabia deserve better from the world of the internet and believe that they deserve more than what is offered to them today.

  • Enough of global services who simply want to clothe themselves in the skin of Arabia.
  • Enough of cheap knockoffs of other services.
  • Enough of services that are here, but not fully here.
  • Enough of “this service is not available in your country”.

anayou believes that in the digital world, there is no third world, no emerging markets, no developing markets. We are all equal digital citizens. And all digital citizens deserve world class services.

Anayou is about me, about you, about us.

Anayou is a place from the people of Arabia, to the people of Arabia, for the people of Arabia.
